```{r,echo=FALSE,cache=FALSE}
suppressPackageStartupMessages(require(DiagrammeR))
grViz("
digraph {

  # graph attributes
  graph [overlap = true]

  # node attributes
  node [shape = box,
        fontname = Helvetica,
        color = blue]

  # edge attributes
  edge [color = gray]

  # node statements
  M; I; V

  # node attributes
  node [shape = circle,
        fixedsize = true,
        width = 0.9]

  # edge statements
  M->I [label='ATG to ATA',fontsize=6];
  M->V [label='ATG to GTG',fontsize=6];
  
}
")
```
